item.title: 精神航空获准在纽约证券交易所上市
item.description: 精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）周四表示，在这家低成本航空公司摆脱破产数周后，它已获准在纽约证券交易所上市。【原文：Spirit Airlines said on Thursday it has received an approval to list its shares on the New York Stock Exchange, weeks after the low-cost carrier emerged from bankruptcy.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数温和增长，裁员人数较少
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数量略有上升，这表明尽管进口商品关税导致经济阴云密布，但劳动力市场依然具有活力。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits rose marginally last week, suggesting the labor market remains resilient despite darkening clouds over the economy caused by tariffs on imported goods.】

item.title: 铁路运营商联合太平洋公司季度业绩不及预期
item.description: 受汽车运输疲软和燃油附加费下降的影响，铁路运营商联合太平洋公司周四未能达到华尔街对其第一季度利润和收入的预期，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌了 2%。【原文：Railroad operator Union Pacific missed Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit and revenue on Thursday, hurt by weak automotive shipments and lower fuel surcharge, sending its shares down 2% in premarket trading.】

item.title: UPS 将以 16 亿美元收购 Andlauer 医疗保健公司
item.description: 包裹巨头 UPS 周四表示，将以 16 亿美元的价格收购加拿大 Andlauer 医疗保健集团，从而加强其医疗保健物流业务。【原文：Parcel giant UPS said on Thursday it would buy Canada's Andlauer Healthcare Group for $1.6 billion, boosting its healthcare logistics business.】

item.title: 得益于军用直升机和航空售后市场需求，德事隆季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 赛斯纳公务机制造商德事隆（Textron）周四公布的第一季度利润和收入超出预期，主要得益于贝尔（Bell）业务部门的持续走强，以及航空业务部门对售后零部件和服务的强劲需求。【原文：Cessna business jet maker Textron beat first-quarter profit and revenue estimates on Thursday, driven by sustained strength in its Bell segment as well as robust demand for aftermarket parts and services in its Aviation segment.】

item.title: 自由港麦克莫兰公司因关税导致成本增加，季度利润下降
item.description: 弗里波特麦克莫兰公司（Freeport-McMoRan）周四表示，拟议的关税可能会使该铜矿商在美国采购商品的成本增加约 5%。【原文：Freeport-McMoRan said on Thursday the proposed tariffs could increase costs of goods the copper miner purchases in the United States by about 5%.】

item.title: 由于支付处理部门业绩下滑，Fiserv 季度收入不及预期
item.description: 受支付处理部门需求放缓的影响，Fiserv 周四未能达到华尔街对其第一季度营收的预期，导致该公司股价在盘前交易中下跌约 7%。【原文：Fiserv missed Wall Street estimates for first-quarter revenue on Thursday, hurt by slowing demand in its payments processing unit, sending the company's shares down about 7% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 因各部门需求稳定，Interpublic 季度收入超出预期
item.description: Interpublic 集团周四公布的第一季度营收超出预期，这主要得益于该公司旗下 Mediabrands、Deutsch 和 Golin 分部客户稳定的营销支出。【原文：Interpublic Group beat first-quarter revenue estimates on Thursday, helped by steady marketing spend by clients at the company's Mediabrands, Deutsch and Golin divisions.】

item.title: L3Harris 下调 2025 年航空业务剥离预测
item.description: 美国国防承包商 L3Harris 科技公司周四下调了全年利润和收入预期，此前该公司的季度销售额未达预期，原因是其太空部门的业务量下降，以及剥离了航空解决方案业务。【原文：U.S. defense contractor L3Harris Technologies on Thursday cut its full-year profit and revenue forecasts after missing quarterly sales expectations, citing decreased volumes in its space unit and the divestment of its aviation solutions business.】

item.title: 大众将在美国与优步（Uber）签订协议，提供自动驾驶电动货车
item.description: 德国汽车制造商大众汽车公司表示，在与优步科技公司（Uber Technologies）达成的合作协议中，大众汽车将提供数千辆电动货车，双方将在未来十年内寻求在美国提供完全自动驾驶汽车的乘车服务。【原文：Volkswagen will supply thousands of electric vans in a collaboration agreement with Uber Technologies as the partners seek to offer rides in fully autonomous vehicles in the United States over the next decade, the German carmaker said.】

item.title: 数据中心需求助力多佛尔第一季度利润超预期
item.description: 多福周四公布的第一季度利润超出预期，主要得益于其生产数据中心服务器冷却组件的部门销售强劲。【原文：Dover on Thursday beat first-quarter profit estimates, helped by strong sales at its segment that makes components to cool down servers at data centers.】

item.title: Stellantis 将印度作为其中国合作伙伴开发电动汽车的目标市场
item.description: Stellantis计划最快于今年年底在印度销售其合作伙伴Leapmotor开发的中国品牌电动汽车，该合资企业的负责人表示。【原文：Stellantis plans to sell Chinese-branded electric vehicles developed by its partner Leapmotor in India as soon as the end of this year, the executive leading the joint venture said.】

item.title: Ameriprise Financial 的季度利润因财富管理业务强劲而上升
item.description: Ameriprise Financial 周四公布，受财富管理业务强劲的推动，第一季度利润增长了 8%。【原文：Ameriprise Financial reported an 8% rise in first-quarter profit on Thursday, buoyed by the strength in its wealth management business.】

item.title: 美国需求强劲，Keurig Dr Pepper 盈利超出预期
item.description: Keurig Dr Pepper 周四公布的第一季度营收和利润高于华尔街预期，主要得益于美国消费者对其能量饮料和饮品的强劲需求。【原文：Keurig Dr Pepper reported first-quarter revenue and profit above Wall Street expectations on Thursday, helped by strong demand for its energy drinks and beverages among U.S. consumers.】

item.title: 英国阻止向俄罗斯出口电子游戏控制器，试图挫败无人机飞行员的锐气
item.description: 英国周四表示，将禁止向俄罗斯出口可用于驾驶无人机的视频游戏控制器，这是继莫斯科入侵乌克兰后英国最新一揽子贸易措施的一部分。【原文：Britain on Thursday said it was banning the export to Russia of video game controllers which can be used to pilot drones, part of its latest package of trade measures following Moscow's invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: 印度 Tech Mahindra 公司季度收入受通信部门影响
item.description: 印度软件服务出口商 Tech Mahindra 周四公布的第四季度收入低于预期，原因是其通信和高科技垂直行业持续疲软。【原文：Indian software services exporter Tech Mahindra reported a smaller-than-expected fourth-quarter revenue on Thursday due to persistent weakness in its communications and hi-tech verticals.】

item.title: 自动驾驶技术需求强劲，Mobileye Global 营收超出预期
item.description: 受益于汽车制造商对其驾驶辅助技术订单的增加，Mobileye Global 公司周四公布的第一季度营收超出华尔街预期。【原文：Mobileye Global beat Wall Street expectations for first-quarter revenue on Thursday, benefiting from an increase in orders for its driver-assistance technology from automakers.】

item.title: 尽管季度利润下降，CenterPoint 仍将投入更多资金满足人工智能电力需求
item.description: CenterPoint Energy 周四公布第一季度利润下降，但该美国公用事业公司上调了资本支出计划，以满足用于人工智能技术的数据中心的预期需求。【原文：CenterPoint Energy reported a fall in first-quarter profit on Thursday, but the U.S. utility raised its capital expenditure plan to meet expected demand from data centers used for artificial intelligence technologies.】

item.title: 纳斯达克第一季度利润增长，因金融科技和解决方案产品需求强劲
item.description: 纳斯达克周四公布第一季度利润增长，原因是市场对该交易所运营商的金融技术和解决方案产品的需求依然强劲。【原文：Nasdaq reported a higher first-quarter profit on Thursday, as demand for the exchange operator's financial technology and solutions products remained robust.】

item.title: 联邦支出削减和经济不确定性影响咨询业务，IBM业绩下滑
item.description: 国际商业机器公司（International Business Machines）的股票在周四的盘前交易中下跌了 6% 以上，因为该公司称其部分联邦合同被暂停，而不确定的经济形势对其咨询业务构成了进一步的威胁。【原文：Shares of International Business Machines fell over 6% in premarket trading on Thursday after the company said some of its federal contracts were suspended, while an uncertain economy poses a further threat to its consulting business.】

item.title: 特朗普关税引发需求不确定性，美国航空公司下调 2025 年业绩预期
item.description: 美国航空公司（American Airlines）周四撤回了对2025年的财务预测，这与其他同行的做法如出一辙，因为在关税压力和政府支出不确定性的影响下，人们对可自由支配预算的担忧阻碍了航空公司预测旅行需求的能力。【原文：American Airlines withdrew its 2025 financial forecast on Thursday, mirroring its peers, as concerns over discretionary budget amid tariff pressures and government spending uncertainties hinder carriers' ability to predict travel demand.】

item.title: 康卡斯特报告宽带用户流失增加，竞争日趋白热化
item.description: 康卡斯特公司（Comcast）周四公布的第一季度报告显示，该公司宽带用户的下降幅度大于预期，原因是受到了将移动服务与高速互联网计划捆绑在一起的无线运营商的激烈竞争。【原文：Comcast reported a larger-than-expected decline in broadband customers in the first quarter on Thursday, hit by intense competition from wireless carriers that bundle mobile services with high-speed internet plans.】

item.title: 特斯拉加倍推进机器人出租车时间表；投资者既兴奋又怀疑
item.description: 特斯拉在最新的财报电话会议上承诺将很快推出商用机器人出租车业务，首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）承诺，到明年年底，自动驾驶汽车将 "以显著的方式 "推动财务指标的增长。【原文：Tesla peppered its latest earnings call with pledges to launch commercial robotaxi operations soon, with CEO Elon Musk promising that autonomous vehicles will "move the financial needle in a significant way" by late next year.】

item.title: 癌症药物销售强劲，百时美施贵宝季度收入好于预期
item.description: 布里斯托尔-迈尔斯-施贵宝公司（Bristol Myers Squibb）周四公布的第一季度营收好于预期，并上调了全年业绩预期，这主要得益于该公司刺激患者自身免疫系统抗癌的药物组合的增长。【原文：Bristol Myers Squibb reported better-than-expected first-quarter revenue on Thursday and raised its full-year forecast due to growth from its portfolio of drugs that spur a patient's own immune system to fight cancer.】

item.title: Coinbase 免除 PayPal 稳定币手续费，推动加密货币支付发展
item.description: 最大的公开交易加密货币交易所 Coinbase 将免除与 PayPal 稳定币相关的交易费用，并允许其用户直接用这种代币兑换美元，这对 PayPal 来说是一个重要的里程碑，因为该公司正在加倍努力发展加密货币支付。【原文：Coinbase, the largest publicly traded cryptocurrency exchange, is waiving fees on transactions connected to PayPal's stablecoin and allowing its users to redeem the token directly for U.S. dollars, a major milestone for PayPal as the company doubles down on crypto payments.】

item.title: Vinfast 公布，由于交付量增加，第四季度收入激增 70
item.description: 越南电动汽车制造商 Vinfast 周四报告称，受电动汽车交付量增加的帮助，公司第四季度收入猛增 70%。【原文：Vietnamese electric-vehicle maker Vinfast reported a 70% jump in fourth-quarter revenue on Thursday, helped by higher deliveries of its electric vehicles.】

item.title: 孩之宝季度业绩因数字游戏需求而增长
item.description: 孩之宝公司（Hasbro）周四公布的第一季度业绩超过了华尔街的预期，这主要得益于玩具制造商数字游戏部门的强劲表现，使得该公司股价在盘前交易中上涨了约 4%。【原文：Hasbro reported first-quarter results on Thursday that beat Wall Street estimates, helped by strength in the toymaker's digital gaming segment, sending the company's shares up about 4% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 中国推动取消关税以结束美国贸易战
item.description: 中国周四呼吁取消美国的所有 "单边 "关税，因为有迹象表明特朗普政府可能会缓和与中国政府的贸易战。【原文：China called for all "unilateral" U.S. tariffs to be cancelled on Thursday, as signs emerged that the Trump administration may de-escalate its trade war with Beijing.】

item.title: 默克公司利润增长，关税成本为 2 亿美元
item.description: 默克公司周四表示，第一季度调整后利润增长了 7%，原因是成本下降帮助抵消了销售额 2% 的下降，这反映出由于需求下滑，该公司 1 月份决定暂停向中国运输加卫苗。【原文：Merck on Thursday said its first-quarter adjusted profit rose 7% as lower costs helped offset a 2% decline in sales, reflecting a January decision to pause shipments of its Gardasil vaccine to China due to a downturn in demand.】

item.title: 美国 那是死猫反弹吗？
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的关键所在。【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today.】
